name: Southeast Asian History and Culture [4] Quiz | World | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which is not a major ethnic group of Singapore?
What is the Romanized Vietnamese alphabet called?
What is the Thai version of the Hindu Ramayana called?
questions.explanation:
Ramakian.

	The first complete written version was completed during the reign of the great Siamese king Rama I in 1797.

questions.text: What was the name of the supreme council of the Burmese state during the time it was a kingdom?
What is the name of the unusual lake in central Cambodia?
What was the first Southeast Asian city of modern times to achieve a population of 1 million?
What is the name of the epic Vietnamese poem written by Nguyen Du in the early 1800s?
questions.explanation:
Doan truong tan thanh.

	This poem is more popularly known as the 'Kim Van Kieu' after the names of the 3 main characters.

options: A cannabalistic tribe of New Guinea who have disappeared
Small farm implements used for rice cultivation
The provincial elite of Malaysia during British rule

questions.text: What was the name of the Vietnamese communist party in the South?
What was the name of the Thai ruler who skillfully negotiated with the British to keep Thailand under self-rule?
questions.explanation:
Mongkut.

	He's also the king depicted in the film 'The King and I'!
